MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr. We are aware of previous power issues in the area, and apologise for this. Power restoration is taking longer than expected because of more generators required onsite and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8.45pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:37PM on Sunday 03 January 2021.
